TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebEventBufferFlushInfo extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含定义刷新缓冲区特性的参数。

span.span: Contains the parameters defining the flush buffer characteristics.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 运行状况监视，用于管理已部署的 Web 应用程序的生产和操作人员。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空间包含负责打包应用程序运行状况状态数据和负责处理此数据提供程序类型的运行状况事件类型。The namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它还包含在管理运行状况事件期间帮助的支持类型。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 类定义识别缓冲区的当前状态的值。The class defines values that identify the buffer's current status. 类的实例传递作为参数传递给方法，用于处理已缓冲的消息。An instance of the class is passed as a parameter to the method that processes the messages that have been buffered. 需要刷新缓冲区时，ASP.NET 运行状况监视调用此方法。ASP.NET health monitoring calls this method when the flushing of the buffer is required. 这由定义的参数`bufferModes`中的元素`healthMonitoring`配置节。This is determined by the parameters defined by the `bufferModes` element in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. > [!NOTE] > 按照设计，缓冲机制可能会删除以跟上的传入事件的某些事件。By design, the buffering mechanism might drop some events in order to keep pace with the incoming events. 由用户通过适当地修改调整此机制`bufferModes`中的元素`healthMonitoring`配置节。It is up to the user to adjust this mechanism by properly modifying the `bufferModes` element in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类。The following code example shows how to use the class. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider/CS/bufferedwebeventprovider.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider/VB/bufferedwebeventprovider.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Events As WebBaseEventCollection

summary.span: 获取当前消息中的事件集合。

span.span: Gets the events collection in the current message.

value.span: 当前消息中包含的 事件。

span.span: The events contained in the current message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于缓冲、 多个事件通常在一条消息发送。Due to buffering, several events are usually sent in a single message. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider/CS/bufferedwebeventprovider.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider/VB/bufferedwebeventprovider.vb#11)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EventsDiscardedSinceLastNotification As Integer
public: property int EventsDiscardedSinceLastNotification { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取自从上次通知以来丢弃的事件数。

span.span: Gets the number of events dropped since the last notification.

value.span: 自从上次通知以来缓冲机制丢弃的事件数。

span.span: The number of events dropped by the buffering mechanism since the last notification.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按照设计，缓冲机制可能会删除以跟上的传入事件的某些事件。By design, the buffering mechanism might drop some events in order to keep pace with the incoming events. 由用户通过适当地修改调整此机制`bufferModes`中的元素`healthMonitoring`配置节。It is up to the user to adjust this mechanism by properly modifying the `bufferModes` element in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 获取缓冲区中的事件数。

span.span: Gets the number of events in the buffer.
The number of events in the buffer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通知的开始处捕获此数量。This number is captured at the beginning of the notification. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
